definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: number;—pl. abs. [[לאׁ יׇדַעְתִּי]] [[סְפׂרוֹת]] Ps 71:15 I know not (the) numbers (of ´[[י]]'s acts of righteousness and deliverance, i.e. they are innumerable; cf. Targum Symm.); >Du (after LXX B:ab [[א]] SyrVer Vulgate) reads [[סְפָרוֹת]] (cf. [[סִפְרָה]] supr.). p. 707
